arm_group.description: Patients with hallux rigidus treated by the surgery type "cheilectomy"
Patients with hallux rigidus treated by the type of surgery "arthrodesis"
Patients with hallux rigidus treated by other type of surgery: Arthoplasty, joint resection ("Keller-Brandes technique)
Patients after cheilectomy due to hallux rigidus
Patients after arthrodesis of the metatarsophalageal joint due to hallux rigidus
Patients after other types of surgery due to hallux rigidus: arthroplasty or resection of the first metatarso-phalangeal joint

brief_summary.textblock:
The aim was to investigate with a multi-segmental foot model the kinetic and kinematic in
      patients with a hallux rigidus, before and after different type of surgery.

clinical_study.brief_title: Motion Analysis in Patients With Hallux Rigidus

detailed_description.textblock:
None of the patients received surgery BECAUSE of the study. We have only performed motion
      analysis in patients, who were already scheduled for one of the described type of surgery
      (prospective group) or who already previously received one the type of surgery
      (retrospective group).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  patients with osteoarthritis of one or both first metatarso-phalangeal joints (hallux
             rigidus)

          -  patients after surgery due to osteoarthritis of one or both first
             metatarso-phalangeal joints (hallux rigidus)

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  previous operations on the foot and ankle

          -  rheumatic diseases

          -  relevant foot deformities other than hallux rigidus

study_pop.textblock: Patients with osteoarthritis in the first metatarso-phalangeal joint (hallux rigidus)

intervention.description: 3D Motion analysis with retroflective markers on the skin (Vicon camera system) of the foot and lower leg (kinematics), walking over force plate (kinetics) and pressure plates (plantar pressure distribution).

facility.name: Motion Analysis Laboratory of the Department of Orthopedics, Trauma Surgery and Spinal Cord Injury, University Hospital Heidelberg

clinical_study.official_title: Motion Analysis in Patients With Hallux Rigidus Before and After Different Types of Surgery

primary_outcome.measure: Change of hallux range of motion
primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline (=1 day before surgery) and 1 y. after surgery for the prospective groups, more than one year after surgery for the retrospective groups

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.
